None.Name: Water of Life
None.Description: Friendly units within 25m radius will be healed for up to 220 in total per second. There is an inital healing capability of 3000 that may exhaust but will restore over time. Cannot be disabled by spellblocking abilities.

Extra.en: Healing Well does not have max healing capacity when built. Instead,  it slowly stores 120 lifepoints per 6 seconds,  up to a maximum capacity of 3000. It therefore takes 150 seconds for a Healing Well to be full.
